security: Revealing the CIA's attempts to place personnel within international corporations could damage its operational capabilities and reputation. The cable mentions, "HDOS HAS INFO TO EFFECT HILTON HOTELS INTERNATIONAL SEEKING QUALIFIED PERSON AS FUEREL DIRECTOR FOR MEXICO AND CENTRAL AMERICA. HAS GOOD POSSIBILITY WE IN AXLE PLACE INCREASED STAFF POSITION."
summary: A cable from Mexico City indicates that Hilton Hotels International is seeking a qualified director for Mexico and Central America, presenting a potential opportunity for the CIA to place an agent in an increased staff position.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET cable from Mexico City, dated October 30, 1963, discusses an opportunity for the CIA to place an agent within Hilton Hotels International. The message states that Hilton is seeking a qualified director for its operations in Mexico and Central America, and the CIA (HDOS) sees this as a chance to place an agent in an increased staff position. The station is working to ensure the cover is suitable, providing the required secret access, qualifications, and characteristics needed to fill the position.
title: Potential Placement within Hilton Hotels International
